code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Container,Typography,Button,TextField,Snackbar,Alert}from'@mui/material';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProveMRC=()=>{const[code,setCode]=useState('');const[result,setResult]=useState(null);const[error,setError]=useState(null);const handleCheck=async()=>{if(code.trim()){try{const response=await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/check-mrc',{content:code});setResult(response.data.isReadable?'Yes, it is machine-readable code':'No, it is not machine-readable');setError(null);}catch(err){setError('Error checking machine readability.
